meta.why: Breaking big goals into small, achievable steps prevents overwhelm and builds confidence. This systematic approach increases your chances of success and reduces fear of failure.

hero.title: Goal Ladder Mini-Tool
hero.subtitle: Break big steps down into manageable rungs
hero.description: Recovery goals can feel overwhelming when viewed as one big leap. A goal ladder helps you climb step by step, building confidence and momentum along the way.

tiles.title: **Start Small**
content: Make first step so easy you can't fail
Small wins create positive feedback loops
Each step prepares you for the next

tiles.title: **Adjust as Needed**
content: Steps too hard? Make them smaller

microAction.title: Build Your Ladder
microAction.description: Think of one recovery goal. Break it into 5 small steps, starting with something you can do today. Write them down and commit to step 1.
microAction.action: Complete your first ladder step within 24 hours

resourceLabel: Learn more about effective goal setting
